# Delta Chat Documentation

> Delta Chat is the most decentralized messenger — it works over email. No phone number needed, fully encrypted by default, and works with anyone's email address.

This is the official documentation for Delta Chat, covering usage guides, server administration, bot development, and Webxdc app development.

## About Delta Chat

Delta Chat is a decentralized and open messaging app that runs on top of email. It looks and feels like other popular messenger apps but uses the existing email infrastructure. All messages are encrypted with Autocrypt and optionally with OpenPGP. No central servers, no phone number required.

- Website: https://delta.chat
- Source Code: https://github.com/deltachat
- Support: https://support.delta.chat
